requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 710
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 710
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G630 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
